summary: This new code file, index.html, contributes to the system by providing the main page layout for the Charlie Movies website. It includes a logo, a hamburger menu for navigation, a section for displaying latest movie releases, and genre options for users to explore. Additionally, it includes functionality for navigating between different pages within the website using JavaScript onclick events. This file introduces the layout structure and key navigation elements required for a user-friendly browsing experience on the website.
